Description_lang: Attacking Peril or Strife will increase their $@spellname113315, inflicting $113394s1 Shadow damage to all enemies every 2 seconds and increasing damage done by 10%. Reaching 10 stacks of $@spellname113315 will cause Peril or Strife to become immune to all damage for $113309d.This effect stacks.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage dealt increased by $s2%.Focusing your attacks on this unit is causing it to intensify.
